GSP31iskgaudu:89: ahaṃkāro 'pi buddherutpadyata iti vikṛtiḥ sa ca pañcatanmātrāṇyutpādayatīti prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:90: tatra śabdatanmātramahaṃkārādutpadyata iti vikṛtistasmādākāśamutpadyata iti prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:91: tathā sparśatanmātramahaṃkārādutpadyata iti vikṛtistadevaṃ vāyumutpādayatīti prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:93: rūpatanmātramahaṃkārādutpadyata iti vikṛtistadevaṃ teja utpādayatīti prakṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:94: rasatanmātramahaṃkārādutpadyata iti vikṛtistadevaṃ āpa utpādayatīti prakṛtiḥ /

GSP31iskgaudu:100: iha loke prameyavastu pramāṇena sādhyate yathā prasthādibhirvrīhayastulayā candanādi /

GSP31iskgaudu:106: pratyakṣeṇānumānena va yo 'rtho na gṛhyate sa āptavacanādgrāhyaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:107: yathendroḥ devarājaḥ uttarāḥ kuravaḥ svarge 'psarasa ityādi /
GSP31iskgaudu:117: arthāpattiḥ sambhavaḥ abhāvaḥ pratibhā aitihyaṃ upamānaṃ ceti ṣaṭ pramāṇāni /

GSP31iskgaudu:138: bravīti loko yathātra vaṭe yakṣiṇī pravasatītyeva aitihyam /
GSP31iskgaudu:144: tasmāttriṣveva sarvapramāṇasiddhatvāt trividhaṃ pramāṇamiṣṭaṃ tadāha tena trividhena pramāṇena pramāṇasiddhirbhavatītita vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:146: prameyaṃ pradhānaṃ buddhirahaṃkāraḥ pañcatanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi pañcamahābhūtāni puruṣa iti etāni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni vyaktāvyaktajñānyucyante /
GSP31iskgaudu:147: tatra kiñcit pratyakṣeṇa sādhyaṃ kiñcidanumānena kiñcidāgameneti trividhaṃ pramāṇamuktaṃ // tasya kiṃ lakṣaṇametadāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:150: prativiṣayeṣu śrotrādināṃ śabdādiviṣayeṣu adhyavasāyo dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣamityarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:151: trividhamanumānamākhyātaṃ śeṣavat pūrvavat sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ceti /
GSP31iskgaudu:152: pūrvamasyāstīti pūrvavad yathā meghonnatyā vṛṣṭiṃ sādhayati pūrvavṛṣṭitvāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:153: śeṣavadyathā samudrādekaṃ jalapalaṃ lavaṇamāsādya śeṣasyāpyasti lavaṇabhāva iti /

GSP31iskgaudu:173: atra kaścidāha pradhānaḥ puruṣo vā nopalabhyate yaśca nopalabhyate loke tannāsti tasmāttāvapi na staḥ /

GSP31iskgaudu:232: kiṃ cānyadanityaṃ yasmādanyasmādutpadyate yathā mṛtpiṇḍādutpadyate ghaṭaḥ sa cānityaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:233: kiṃ cāvyāpyasarvvagamityarthaḥ yathā pradhānapuruṣau sarvvagatau naiva vyaktam
GSP31iskgaudu:234: / kiṃcānyat sakriyaṃ saṃsārakāle saṃsarati trayodaśavidhena karaṇena
GSP31iskgaudu:235: saṃyuktaṃ sūkṣmaṃ śarīramāśritya saṃsarati tasmāt sakriyam /

GSP31iskgaudu:237: kiṃca liṅgaṃ layayuktaṃ layakāle pañcamahābhūtāni tanmātreṣu līyante tānyekādaśendriyaiḥ sahāhaṃkāre sa ca buddhau sā ca pradhāne layaṃ yātīti /
GSP31iskgaudu:238: tathā sāvayavaṃ avayavāḥ śabdasparśarasarūpagandhāḥ taiḥ saha /
GSP31iskgaudu:239: kiṃca paratantraṃ nātmanaḥ prabhavati yathā pradhānatantrā buddhiḥ buddhitantro 'haṃkāraḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:240: ahaṃkāratantrāṇi tanmātrāṇīndriyāṇi ca tanmātratantrāṇi pañcamahābhūtāni ca /
GSP31iskgaudu:246: nahi pradhānāt paraṃ kiñcidasti yataḥ pradhānasyānutpattiḥ tasmādahetumadavyaktam /
GSP31iskgaudu:247: tathānityaṃ ca vyaktaṃ nityamavyaktamanutpādyatvāt nahi bhūtāni kutaścidutpadyanteti pradhānam
GSP31iskgaudu:248: kiṃ cāvyāpi vyaktaṃ vyāpi pradhānaṃ kāryyaṃ syāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:249: tathā vyaktaṃ liṅgamaliṅgamavyaktaṃ nityatvānmahadādi liṅgaṃ pralayakāle parasparaṃ pralīyate naivaṃ pradhānaṃ tasmādaliṅgaṃ pradhānam /
GSP31iskgaudu:250: tathā sāvayavaṃ vyaktaṃ niravayavamavyaktaṃ nahi śabdasparśarasarūpagandhāḥ pradhāne santi
GSP31iskgaudu:252: evaṃ vyaktāvyaktayorvaidharmmyamuktaṃ sādharmmyamucyate yaduktaṃ sarūpaṃ ca /
GSP31iskgaudu:254: vyaktaṃ tathā pradhānaṃ tadviparītastathā ca pumān // ISk_11 //
GSP31iskgaudu:255: triguṇaṃ vyaktaṃ sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇā yasyeti /
GSP31iskgaudu:257: idaṃ vyaktamime guṇā iti na vivekakarttuṃ yāti ayaṃ gaurayamaśva iti yathā ye guṇāstadvyaktaṃ yadvyaktaṃ te ca guṇā iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:258: tathā viṣayo vyaktaṃ bhojyamityarthaḥ sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ viṣayabhūtatvāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:261: tathā prasavadharmi vyaktaṃ tadyathā buddherahaṃkāraḥ prasūyate tasmāt pañcatanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi ca prasūyante tanmātrebhyaḥ pañcamahābhūtāni /
GSP31iskgaudu:262: evamete vyaktadharmāḥ prasavadharmāntā uktā evamebhiravyaktaṃ sarūpaṃ yathā vyaktaṃ tathā pradhānamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:263: tatra triguṇaṃ vyaktamavyaktamapi triguṇaṃ yasyaitanmahadādi kāryaṃ triguṇam /
GSP31iskgaudu:264: iha yadātmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadātmakaṃ kāryamiti yathā kṛṣṇatantukṛtaḥ kṛṣṇa eva paṭo bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:265: tathāviveki vyaktaṃ pradhānamapi guṇairna bhidyate anye guṇā anyat pradhānameva vivaktuṃ na yāti tadaviveki pradhānam /
GSP31iskgaudu:266: tathā viṣayo vyaktaṃ pradhānamapi sarvapuruṣaviṣayabhūtatvādviṣaya iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:268: tathācetanaṃ vyaktaṃ pradhānamapi sukhaduḥkhamohānna cetayatīti kathamanumīyata iha hyacetanānmṛtpiṇḍādacetano ghaṭā utpadyate
GSP31iskgaudu:276: acetanaṃ vyaktamavyaktaṃ ca cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohāṃścetayati saṃjānīte tasmāccetanaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:277: prasavadharmi vyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ cāprasavadharmī puruṣo nahi kiñcit puruṣāt prasūyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:280: tat pūrvasyāmāryāyāṃ pradhānamahetumadyathā vyākhyātaṃ tathā ca pumān tadyathā hetumadananityamityādi vyaktaṃ tadviparītamavyaktaṃ tatra hetumadvyaktamahetumat pradhānaṃ tathā ca pumānahetumānanutpādyatvāt anityaṃ vyaktaṃ nityaṃ pradhānaṃ tathā ca nityaḥ pumān /
GSP31iskgaudu:284: liṅgaṃ vyaktamaliṅgaṃ pradhānaṃ tathā ca pumānapyaliṅgaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:286: sāvayavaṃ vyaktaṃ niravayavamavyaktaṃ tathā ca pumān niravayavaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:288: kiṃca paratantraṃ vyaktaṃ svatantramavyaktaṃ tathā ca pumānapi svatantraḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:291: vyaktapradhānayoḥ sādharmyaṃ puruṣasya vaidharmyaṃ ca triguṇamavivekītyādi prakṛtyāryāyāṃ vyākhyātam // 11 //
GSP31iskgaudu:292: tatra yaduktaṃ triguṇamiti vyaktamavyaktaṃ ca tat ke te guṇā iti tat svarūpapratipādanāyedamāha
GSP31iskgaudu:296: tatra prītyātmakaṃ sattvaṃ prītiḥ sukhaṃ tadātmakamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:301: arthaḥ śabdaḥ sāmarthyavācī prakāśārthaṃ sattvaṃ prakāśasamarthamityarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:302: pravṛttyarthaṃ rajo niyamārthaṃ tamaḥ sthitau samarthamityarthaḥ prakāśakriyāsthitiśīlā guṇā iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:304: anyonyābhibhavāḥ anyonyāśrayāḥ anyonyajananāḥ anyonyamithunāḥ anyonyavṛttayaśca te tathoktāḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:305: anyonyābhibhavā iti anyonyaṃ parasparamabhibhavantīti prītyaprītyādibhirdharmmairāvirbhavanti yathā yadā sattvamutkaṭaṃ bhavati tadā rajastamasī aprītipravṛttidharmmeṇa yadā tamastadā sattvarajasī viṣādasthityātmakena iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:308: tathānyonyamithunāśca yathā strīpuṃsau anyonyamithunau tathā guṇāḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:310: rajaso mithunaṃ sattvaṃ sattvasya mithunaṃ rajaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:313: anyonyavṛttayaśca parasparaṃ varttante guṇāḥ guṇeṣu varttanta iti vacanāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:314: yathā surūpā suśīlā strī sarvvasukhahetuḥ sapatnīnāṃ saiva duḥkhahetuḥ saiva rāgiṇāṃ mohaṃ janayati eva satvaṃ rajastamasorvṛttiheturyathā rājā sadodyuktaḥ prajāpālane duṣṭanigrahe śiṣṭānāṃ sukhamutpādayati duṣṭānāṃ duḥkhaṃ mohaṃ ca evaṃ rajassattvatamasorvṛttiṃ janayati tathā tamaḥ svarūpeṇāvaraṇātmakena sattvarajasorvṛttiṃ janayati yathā meghāḥ khamāvṛtya jagataḥ sukhamutpādayanti te vṛṣṭyā karṣukāṇāṃ karṣaṇodyogaṃ janayanti virahiṇāṃ mohamevamanyonyavṛttayo guṇāḥ // 12 //
GSP31iskgaudu:316: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakamiṣṭamupaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:317: guru varaṇakameva tamaḥ pradīpavaccārthato vṛttiḥ // ISk_13 //
GSP31iskgaudu:318: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakaṃ ca yadā sattvamutkaṭaṃ bhavati tadā laghūnyaṅgāni buddhiprakāśaśca prasannatendriyāṇāṃ bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:319: upaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ upaṣṭambhātītyupaṣṭambhakamudyotakaṃ yathā vṛṣo vṛṣadarśane utkaṭamupaṣṭambhaṃ karoti eva rajovṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:320: tathā rajaśca calaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ rajovṛttiścalacitto bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:321: guru varaṇamekameva tamaḥ yadā tama utkaṭaṃ bhavati tadā gurūṇyaṅgānyāvṛtānīndriyāṇi bhavanti svārthāsamarthāni /
GSP31iskgaudu:322: atrāha yadi guṇāḥ parasparaṃ viruddhāḥ svamatenaiva kamarthaṃ niṣpādayanti tarhi kathaṃ pradīpavaccārthato vṛttiḥ pradīpena tulyaṃ pradīpavadarthataḥ sādhanā vṛttiriṣṭā yathā pradīpaḥ parasparaviruddhatailāgnivarttisaṃyogādarthaprakāśān janayati evaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:324: antarapraśno bhavati triguṇamaviveki viṣaya ityādi pradhānaṃ vyaktaṃ ca vyākhyātaṃ tatra pradhānamupalabhyamānaṃ mahadādi ca triguṇamavivekyādīti ca kathamavagamyate tatrāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:331: evaṃ vyaktāvyaktasampanno bhavati dūraṃ pradhānamāsannaṃ vyaktaṃ yo vyaktaṃ paśyati sa pradhānamapi paśyati tadviparyayābhāvāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:333: loke yadātmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadātmakaṃ kāryamapi tathā kṛṣṇebhyastantubhyaḥ kṛṣṇa eva paṭo bhavati
GSP31iskgaudu:334: evaṃ mahadādiliṅgamavivekiviṣayaḥ sāmānyacetanaṃ prasavadharmi yadātmakaṃ liṅgaṃ tadātmakamavyaktamapi siddham // 14 //
GSP31iskgaudu:336: evaṃ kāraṇaguṇātmakatvāt kāryasyāvyaktamapi siddhamityetanmithyā loke yannopalabhyate tannāsti evaṃ pradhānamapyasti kiṃ tu nopalabhyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:340: bhedānāṃ parimāṇāloke yatra karttāsti tasya parimāṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā kulālaḥ parimitairmṛtpiṇḍaiḥ parimitāneva ghaṭān karoti evaṃ mahadapi mahadādiliṅgaṃ parimitaṃ bhedataḥ pradhānakāryamekā buddhireko 'haṃkāraḥ pañca tanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi
GSP31iskgaudu:341: pañcatanmātrāṇi ekādaśendriyāṇi pañcamahābhūtānītyevaṃ bhedānāṃ parimāṇādasti pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadvyaktaṃ parimitamutpādayati /yadi
GSP31iskgaudu:342: pradhānaṃ na syāttadā niḥparimāṇamidaṃ vyaktamapi na syāt parimāṇācca bhedānāmasti pradhānaṃ yasmādvyaktamutpannam /
GSP31iskgaudu:343: tathā samanvayādiha loke prasiddhirdṛṣṭā yathā vratadhāriṇaṃ baṭuṃ dṛṣṭvā samanvayati nūnamasya pitarau brāhmaṇāviti evamidaṃ triguṇaṃ mahadādiliṅgaṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhayāmo 'sya yat kāraṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ataḥ samanvayādasti pradhānam /
GSP31iskgaudu:344: tathā śaktitaḥ pravṛtteśca iha yo yasmin śaktaḥ sa tasminnevārthe pravarttate yathā kulālo ghaṭāsya karaṇe samartho ghaṭameva karoti na paṭaṃ rathaṃ vā
GSP31iskgaudu:348: kāraṇasya kāryasya ca vibhāgo yathā ghaṭo dadhimadhūdakapayasāṃ dhāraṇe samartho na tathā taktāraṇaṃ mṛtpiṇḍaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:349: mṛtpiṇḍo vā ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati na caivaṃ ghaṭo mṛtpiṇḍam /
GSP31iskgaudu:351: asti vibhaktaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ yasya vibhāga idaṃ vyaktamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:352: itaśca avibhāgādvaiśvarūpasya viśvaṃ jagat tasya rūpaṃ vyaktiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:353: viśvarūpasya bhāvo vaiśvarūpaṃ tasyāvibhāgādasti pradhānaṃ yasmātrailokyasya pañcānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ parasparaṃ vibhāgo nāsti mahābhūteṣvantarbhūtāstrayo lokā iti pṛthivyāpastejovāyurākāśamiti etāni pañcamahābhūtāni pralayakāle sṛṣṭikrameṇaivāvibhāgaṃ yānti tanmātreṣu pariṇāmiṣu tanmātrāṇyekādaśendriyāṇi cāhaṃkāre ahaṃkāro buddhau
GSP31iskgaudu:354: buddhiḥ pradhāne evaṃ trayo lokāḥ pralayakāle prakṛtāvavibhāgaṃ gacchanti tasmādavibhāgāt kṣīradadhivadvyaktāvyaktayoravyaktaṃ kāraṇam // 15 //
GSP31iskgaudu:359: triguṇataḥ triguṇāt sattvarajastamoguṇā yasmiṃstattriguṇaṃ tatkimuktaṃ bhavati sattvarajastamasāṃ sāmyāvasthā pradhānam /
GSP31iskgaudu:360: tathā samudayāt yathā gaṃgāśrotāṃsi triṇī rudramūrddhani patitāni ekaṃ sroto janayati evaṃ triguṇamavyaktamekaṃ vyaktaṃ janayati tathā vā tantavaḥ samuditāḥ paṭaṃ janayanti evamavyaktaṃ gunasamudayānmahadādi janayatīti triguṇataḥ samudayācca vyaktaṃ jagat pravarttate /
GSP31iskgaudu:362: naiṣa doṣaḥ pariṇāmataḥ salilavat pratipratiguṇāśrayaviśeṣādekasmāt pradhānāt trayo lokāḥ samutpannāstulyabhāvā na bhavanti devāḥ sukhena yuktā manuṣyā duḥkhena tiryañco mohena ekasmāt pradhānāt pravṛttaṃ vyaktaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:365: guṇānāmāśrayo guṇāśrayastadviśeṣastaṃ guṇāśrayaviśeṣaṃ pratinidhāya pratipratiguṇāśrayaviśeṣaṃ pariṇāmāt pravarttate vyaktaṃ yathā ākāśādekarasaṃ salilaṃ patitaṃ nānārūpātsaṃśleṣādbhidyate tadrasāntarairevamekasmāt pradhānāt pravṛttāstrayo lokā naikasvabhāvā bhavanti deveṣu sattvamutkaṭaṃ rajastamasī udāsīne tena te 'tyantasukhino
GSP31iskgaudu:366: manuṣyeṣu raja utkaṭaṃ bhavati sattvatamasī udāsīne tena te 'tyantaduḥkhino tiryakṣu tama utkaṭaṃ bhavati sattvajasī udāsīne tena te 'tyantamūḍhāḥ // 16 //
GSP31iskgaudu:371: yaduktaṃ vyaktāvyaktavijñānānmokṣaḥ prāpyata iti tatra vyaktādanantaramavyaktaṃ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇairadhigatamavyaktavat puruṣo 'pi
GSP31iskgaudu:374: yo 'yaṃ mahadādi saṃghātaḥ sa puruṣārtha ityanumīyate acetanatvāt paryaṅgavat /
GSP31iskgaudu:375: yathā paryaṅka pratyekaṃ gātrotpalakapādavaṭatūlīprachādanapaṭopadhānasaṃghataḥ parārtho nahi svārthaḥ paryaṅkasya nahi kiñcidapi gātrotpalādyavayavānāṃ parasparaṃ kṛtyamasti /
GSP31iskgaudu:376: ato 'vagamyate 'sti puruṣo yaḥ paryaṅke śete yasyārthaṃ paryaṅkastatparārthamidaṃ śarīraṃ pañcānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ saṃghāto varttate
GSP31iskgaudu:377: 'sti puruṣo yasyedaṃ bhogyaśarīraṃ bhogyaṃ mahadādisaṃghātarūpaṃ samutpannamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:378: itaścātmāsti triguṇādiviparyayāt yaduktaṃ pūrvasyāmāryāyāṃ trigunamavivekiviṣaya ityādi /
GSP31iskgaudu:381: tathā coktaṃ ṣaṣṭhitantre puruṣādhiṣṭhitaṃ pradhānaṃ pravarttate /
GSP31iskgaudu:383: yathā madhurāmlalavaṇakaṭutiktakaṣāyaṣaḍrasopabṛṃhitsya saṃyktasyānnasya sādhyate evaṃ mahadādiliṅgasya bhoktṛtvābhāvādasti sa ātmā yasyedaṃ bhogyaṃ śarīramti /
GSP31iskgaudu:384: itaśca kaivalyārthama pravṛtteśca kevalasya bhāvaḥ kaivalyaṃ tannimitaṃ yā ca pravṛttistasyāḥ svakaivalyārthaṃ pravṛtteḥ sakāśādanumīyate astyātmeti yato sarvo vidvānavidvāṃśca saṃsārasantānakṣayamicchati evamebhirhetubhirastyātmā śarīrādvyatiriktaḥ // 17 //
GSP31iskgaudu:385: atha sa kimekaha sarvaśarīre 'dhiṣṭhātā maṇirasanātmakasūtravat āhosvidbahava ātmānaḥ pratiśarīramadhiṣṭhātāra ityatrocyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:388: janma ca maraṇaṃ ca karaṇāni ca janmamaraṇakaraṇāni teṣāṃ pratiniyamāt pratyekaniyamādityarthaḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:389: yadyeka eva ātmā syāttata ekasya janmani sarva eva jāyeran ekasya maraṇe sarve 'pi mriyeran ekasya karaṇavaikalye
GSP31iskgaudu:391: badhirāndhakuṇikhaṃjāḥ syurna caivaṃ bhavati tasmājjanmamaraṇakaraṇānāṃ pratiniyamāt puruṣabahutvaṃ siddham /
GSP31iskgaudu:392: itaścāyugapat pravṛtteśca yugapadekakālaṃ na yugapadayugapat pravarttanaṃ yasmādayugapaddharmādiṣu pravṛttirdṛśyate eke dharme pravṛttā anye 'dharme vairāgye 'nye jñāne 'nye
GSP31iskgaudu:393: pravṛttāḥ tasmādayugapat pravṛtteśca bahava iti siddham /
GSP31iskgaudu:395: yathā sāmānye janmani ekaḥ sāttvikaḥ sukhī /
GSP31iskgaudu:402: tasmācca viparyāsāttasmācca yathoktatraiguṇyaviparyāsādviparyayānnirguṇaḥ puruṣo vivekī bhoktetyādiguṇānāṃ puruṣasya yo viparyāsa uktastasmāt sattvarajastamaḥsu karttṛbhūteṣu sākṣitvaṃ siddhaṃ puruṣasyeti yo
GSP31iskgaudu:404: guṇā eva karttāraḥ pravarttante sākṣī na pravattate nāpi nivarttata eva /
GSP31iskgaudu:408: yathā kaścit parivrājako grāmīṇeṣu karṣaṇārtheṣu pravṛtteṣu kevalo madhyasthaḥ puruṣo
GSP31iskgaudu:410: tasmāddraṣṭṛtvamakarttṛbhāvāśca yasmānmadhyasthastasmāddraṣṭā tasmādakarttā puruṣasteṣāṃ karmaṇāmiti sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇāḥ karmakarttṛbhāvena pravarttante na puruṣa evaṃ puruṣasyāstitvaṃ ca siddham /
GSP31iskgaudu:411: yasmātkarttā puruṣastatkathamadhyavasāyaṃ karoti dharmaṃ kariṣyāmyadharmaṃ na kariṣyāmītyataḥ karttā bhavati na ca karttā puruṣa evamubhayātra doṣaḥ syāditi // 19 //
GSP31iskgaudu:415: iha puruṣaścetanākṛt tena cetanāvabhāsaṃ yuktaṃ mahadādiliṅgaṃ cetanāvadiva bhavati yathā loke ghaṭāḥ śītasaṃyuktaḥ śīta uṣṇasaṃyukta uṣṇa evaṃ mahadādi liṅgaṃ tasya saṃyogāt puruṣasaṃyogāccetanāvadiva bhavati tasmādguṇā adhyavasāyaṃ kurvanti na puruṣaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:416: yadyapi loke puruṣaḥ karttā gaṃtetyādi prayujyate tathāpyakarttā puruṣaḥ kathaṃ guṇakarttṛtve ca tathā kartteva bhavatyudāsīno guṇānāṃ karttṛtve sati udāsīno 'pi
GSP31iskgaudu:418: atra dṛṣṭānto bhavati yathācauraścauraiḥ saha gṛhītaścaura ityavagamyata evaṃ trayo guṇāḥ karttārastaiḥ saṃyuktaḥ puruṣo 'karttāpi karttā bhavati karttṛsaṃyogāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:420: athaitayoḥ pradhānapuruṣayoḥ kiṃ hetuḥ saṃghāta ucyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:423: puruṣasya pradhānena saha saṃyogo darśanārthaṃ prakṛtiṃ mahadādikāryabhūtaparyantaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyati etadarthaṃ pradhānasyāpi puruṣeṇa saṃyogaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:424: kaivalyārthaṃ sa ca saṃyogaḥ paṅgvandhavadubhayorapi draṣṭavyaḥ yathā ekaḥ paṅgurekaścāndha etau dvāvapi gacchantau mahatā sāmarthyenāṭavyāṃ sārthasya stenakṛtādupaplavāt svabandhuparityakto daivāditaśceruśca svagatyā ca tau saṃyogamupayātau punastayoḥ svavacaso viśvastatvena saṃyogo gamanārthaṃ darśanārthaṃ ca bhavatyandhena paṃguḥ skandhamāropitaḥ evaṃ śarīrārūḍhapaṃgudarśitena mārgeṇāndho yāti
GSP31iskgaudu:426: evaṃ puruṣe darśanaśaktirasti paṃguvannakriyā pradhāne kriyāśaktirastyandhavannadarśanaśaktiḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:427: yathā vānayoḥ paṃgvandhayoḥ kṛtārthayorvibhāgo bhaviṣyatīpsitasthānaprāptayorevaṃ pradhānamapi puruṣasya mokṣaṃ kṛtvā nivarttate puruṣo 'pi pradhānaṃ dṛṣṭvā kaivalyaṃ gacchati tayoḥ kṛtārthayorvibhāgo bhaviṣyati /
GSP31iskgaudu:428: kiṃ cānyat tatkṛtaḥ sargastena saṃyogena kṛtastatkṛtaḥ sargaḥ sṛṣṭiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:429: yathā strī puruṣasaṃyogāt sutotpattistataḥ pradhānapuruṣasaṃyogāt sargasyotpattiḥ //
GSP31iskgaudu:433: prakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ brahma avyaktaṃ bahudhānakaṃ māyeti paryāyāḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:434: aliṅgasyāḥ prakṛteḥ sakāśānmahānutpadyate mahān buddhirāsurī matiḥ khyātirjñānaṃ prajñāparyāyairutpadyate tasmācca mahato 'haṃkāra utpadyate
GSP31iskgaudu:438: pañcatanmātrāṇi śabdatanmātraṃ sparśatanmātraṃ rupatanmātraṃ rasatanmātraṃ gandhatanmātramiti
GSP31iskgaudu:440: tata ekādaśendriyāṇi śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇamiti pañca buddhīndriyāṇi
GSP31iskgaudu:441: / vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāḥ pañcakarmendriyāṇyubhayātmakamekādaśaṃ mana eṣa ṣoḍaśako gaṇo 'haṃkārādutpadyate
GSP31iskgaudu:442: kiṃca pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni tasmācchoḍaśakādgaṇāt pañcabhyastanmātrebhyaḥ sakāśāt pañca vai mahābhūtānyutpadyante /
GSP31iskgaudu:443: yaduktaṃ śabdatanmātrādākāśaṃ sparśatanmātrādvāyuḥ rūpatanmātrāttejaḥ rasatanmātrādāpaḥ gandhatanmātrāt pṛthivī evaṃ pañcabhyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pañcamahābhūtānyutpadyante // 22 //
GSP31iskgaudu:444: yaduktaṃ vyaktāvyaktajñavijñānānmokṣa iti tatra mahadādibhūtāntaṃ trayoviṃśatibhedaṃ vyākhyātamavyaktamapi bhedānāṃ parimāṇādityādinā vyākhyātaṃ puruṣo 'pi saṃghātaparārthatvādityādibhirhetubhirvyākhyātaḥ evametāni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni yastrailokyaṃ vyāptaṃ jānāti tasya bhāvo
GSP31iskgaudu:447: jaṭī muṇḍī śikhī vāpi mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:448: tāni yathā prakṛtiḥ puruṣo buddhirahaṃkāraḥ pañcatanmātrā ekādaśendriyāṇi pañcamahābhūtāni ityetāni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni /
GSP31iskgaudu:449: tatroktaṃ prakṛtermahānutpadyate tasya mahataḥ kiṃ lakṣaṇamityetadāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:453: adhyavasanamadhyavasāyaḥ yathā bīje bhaviṣyadvṛttiko 'ṅkurastadvadadhyavasāyo 'yaṃ ghaṭo 'yaṃ paṭa ityevaṃ syati yā sā buddhiriti lakṣyate sā ca buddhiraṣṭāṅgikā sāttvikatāmasarūpabhedāt tatra buddheḥ sāttvikaṃ rūpaṃ caturvidhaṃ bhavati dharmo jñānaṃ vairāgyamaiśvaryaṃ ceti tatra dharmo nāma dayādānayamaniyamalakṣaṇastatra yamā niyamāśca pātañjale 'bhihitā
GSP31iskgaudu:456: bhānamiti paryāyāstacca dvividhaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ ceti tatra bāhyaṃ nāma vedāḥ śikṣā kalpo vyākaraṇaṃ niruktaṃ chandojyotiṣākhyaṣaḍaṅgasahitāḥ purāṇāni nyāyamīmāṃsādharmaśāstrāṇi ceti ābhyantaraṃ prakṛtipuruṣajñānamiyaṃ prakṛtiḥ sattvarajastamasāṃ sāmyāvasthāyaṃ puruṣaḥ siddho nirguṇovyāpī cetana iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:458: ābhyantareṇa jñānena mokṣa ityarthaḥ vairāgyamapi dvividhaṃ bāhyamābhyantaraṃ ca bāhyaṃ dṛṣṭaviṣayavaitṛṣṇyamarjanarakṣaṇakṣayasaṃgahiṃsādoṣadarśanāt viraktasyābhyantaraṃ pradhānamapyatra svapnendrajālasadṛśamiti viraktasya gokṣepsoryadutpadyate tadābhyantaraṃ vairāgyam /
GSP31iskgaudu:459: aiśvaryamīśvarabhāvastaccāṣṭaguṇamaṇimā mahimā garimā laghimā prāptiḥ prākāmyamīśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ yatrakāmāvasāyitvaṃ ceti /
GSP31iskgaudu:468: yatra kāmāvasāyitvaṃ brahmādistambaparyantaṃ yatra kāmastatraivāsya svecchayā sthānāsanavihārānācaratīti
GSP31iskgaudu:469: catvāra etāni buddheḥ sāttvikāni rūpāṇi yadā sattvena rajastamasī abhibhūte tadā pumān buddhiguṇān dharmādīnāpnoti /
GSP31iskgaudu:475: ekādaśakaśca gaṇa ekādaśendriyāṇi tathā tanmātro gaṇaḥ pañcakaḥ pañcalakṣaṇopetaḥ śabdatanmātrasparśatanmātrarūpatanmātrarasatanmātragandhatanmātralakṣaṇopetaḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:479: sattvenābhibhūte yadā rajastamasī ahaṃkāre bhavatastadā so 'haṃkāraḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:480: sāttvikastasya ca pūrvācāryaiḥ saṃjñā kṛtā vaikṛta iti tasmādvikṛtādahaṃkārādekādaśaka indriyagaṇa utpadyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:481: tasmāt sāttvikāni viśuddhānīndriyāṇi svaviṣayasamarthāni tasmāducyate sāttvika ekādaśaka iti
GSP31iskgaudu:482: / kiṃcānyadbhūtādestanmātraḥ sa tāmasaḥ tamasābhibhūte sattvarajasī ahaṃkāre yadā bhavataḥ so 'haṃkārastāmasa ucyate tasya pūrvācāryakṛtā
GSP31iskgaudu:483: saṃjñā bhūtādistasmādbhūtāderahaṃkārāttanmātraḥ pañcako gaṇa utpadyate bhūtānāmādibhūtastamobahulastenoktaḥ sa tāmasa iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:484: tasmādbhūtādeḥ pañcatanmātrako gaṇaḥ kiṃca taijasādubhayaṃ yadārajasābhibhūte sattvatamasī bhavatastadā tasmāt so 'haṃkārastaijasa iti saṃjñāṃ labhate
GSP31iskgaudu:488: ekādaśendriyāṇyutpādayati sa taijasamahaṃkāraṃ sahāyaṃ gṛhṇāti sāttviko niṣkriyaḥ sa taijasayukta indriyotpattau samarthaḥ tathā tāmaso 'haṃkāro
GSP31iskgaudu:489: bhūtādiḥ saṃjñito niṣkriyatvāttaijasenāhaṃkāreṇa kriyāvatā yuktastanmātrāṇyutpādayati tenoktaṃ taijasādubhayamiti evaṃ taijasenāhaṃkāreṇaindriyāṇyekādaśa pañcatanmātrāṇi kṛtāni bhavanti ekādaśaka ityuktaḥ yo vaikṛtāt sāttvikādahaṃkārādutpadyate tasya kā saṃjñetyāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:493: spṛśyate aneneti sparśanaṃ tvagindriyaṃ tadvācī siddhaḥ sparśanaśabdo 'sti tenedaṃ paṭhyate sparśanakānīti śabdasparśarūparasagandhān pañcaviṣayān budhyante avagacchantīti pañca buddhīndriyāṇi vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthān karmendriyāṇyāhuḥ karma kurvantīti karmendriyāṇi /
GSP31iskgaudu:494: tatra vāgvadati hastau nānāvyāpāraṃ kurutaḥ pādau gamanāgamanaṃ pāyurutsargaṃ karoti upastha ānaṃdaṃ prajotpattyā // 26 //
GSP31iskgaudu:495: evaṃ buddhīndriyakarmendriyabhedena daśendriyāṇi vyākhyātāni mana ekādaśakaṃ kimātmakaṃ kiṃ svarūpaṃ ceti taducyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:498: atrendriyavarge mana ubhayātmakaṃ buddhīndriyeṣu buddhīndriyavat karmendriyeṣu karmendriyavat kasmādbuddhīndriyāṇāṃ pravṛttiṃ kalpayati karmendriyāṇāṃ ca tasmādubhayātmakaṃ manaḥ saṃkalpayatīti saṃkalpakam /
GSP31iskgaudu:499: kiṃcānyadindriyaṃ ca sādharmyāt samānadharmabhāvāt sāttvikāhaṃkārādbuddhīndriyāṇi karmendriyāṇi manasā sahotpadyamānāni manasaḥ sādharmyaṃ prati tasmātsādharmyānmano
GSP31iskgaudu:503: buddhīndriyāṇāṃ śabdādayo vṛttayaḥ karmendriyāṇāṃ vacanādayo 'thaitānīndriyāṇi bhinnāni bhinnārthagrāhakāṇi kimīśvareṇota svabhāvena kṛtāni yataḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:507: imānyekādaśendriyāṇi śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ pañcānāṃ vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāśca pañcānāṃ saṃkalpaśca manasa evamete bhinnānāmevendriyāṇāmarthāḥ guṇapariṇāmaviśeṣāt guṇānāṃ pariṇāmo guṇapariṇāmastasya viśeṣādindriyāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ bāhyārthabhedāśca /
GSP31iskgaudu:508: athaitannānātvaṃ neśvareṇa nāhaṃkāreṇa na buddhyā na pradhānena na puruṣeṇa svabhāvāt kṛtaguṇapariṇāmeneti
GSP31iskgaudu:509: guṇānāmacetanatvānna pravarttate pravarttata eva kathaṃ vakṣyatīhaiva vatsavivṛddhinimittaṃ kṣīrasya yathā pravṛttirajñasya puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ tathā pravṛttiḥ pradhānasya /
GSP31iskgaudu:510: evamacetanaguṇāḥ ekādaśendriyabhāvena pravarttante viśeṣā api tatkṛtā eva yenoccaiḥ pradeśe cakṣuḥkhalokanāya sthitaṃ tathā ghrāṇaṃ tathā śrotraṃ tathā jihvā svadeśe svārthagrahaṇāya evaṃ karmendriyāṇyapi yathāyathaṃ svārthasamarthāni svadeśāvasthitāni svabhāvato guṇapariṇāmaviśeṣādeva na tadarthā api yata uktaṃ śāstrāntare /
GSP31iskgaudu:511: guṇā guṇeṣu varttante guṇānāṃ yā vṛttiḥ sā guṇaviṣayā eveti bāhyārthā vijñeyā guṇakṛtā evetyarthaḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:517: aviśeṣavyāvṛtyartho yathā bhikṣā mātraṃ labhyate nānyo viśeṣa iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:518: tatha cakṣū rūpamatre na rasādiṣu evaṃ śeṣāṇyapi tadyathā cakṣuṣo rūpaṃ jihvāyā raso ghrāṇasya gandhaḥ śrotrasya śabdaḥ tvacaḥ sparśaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:519: evameṣāṃ buddhīndriyāṇāṃ vṛttiḥ kathitā karmendriyāṇāṃ vṛttiḥ kathyate vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāśca pañcānāṃ karmendriyāṇāmityarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:520: vāco vacanaṃ hastayorādānaṃ pādayorviharaṇaṃ pāyorbhuktasyāhārasya pariṇatamalotsargaḥ upasthasyānandaḥ sutotpattirviṣayā vṛttiriti sambandhaḥ // 28 //
GSP31iskgaudu:525: adhyavasāyo yo buddhiriti lakṣaṇamuktaṃ saiva buddhivṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:528: saṃkalpakaṃ mana iti lakṣaṇamuktaṃ tena saṃkalpa eva manaso vṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:529: trayasya buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ svālakṣaṇyā vṛttirasāmānyā yā prāgabhihitā buddhīndriyāṇāṃ ca vṛttiḥ sāpyasāmānyaiveti /
GSP31iskgaudu:531: sāmānyakāranavṛttiḥ sāmānyena karaṇānāṃ vṛttiḥ prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañca prāṇāpānasamānodānavyānā iti pañca vāyavaḥ sarvendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyā vṛttiryataḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:532: prāṇo nāma vāyurmukhanāsikāntargocarastasya yat spandanaṃ karma tat trayodaśavidhasyāpi sāmānyā vṛttiḥ sati prāṇe yasmāt karaṇānāmātmalābha iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:536: tathā samāno madhyadeśavartī ya āhārādinayanātsamaṃ nayanāt samāno vāyustatra yatspandanaṃ tat sāmānyaṃ karaṇavṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:537: tathā ūrdhvārohaṇādutkarṣādunnayanādvā udāno nābhideśamastakāntargocarastatrodāne yatspandanaṃ tat sarvendriyāṇāṃ sāmānyā vṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:539: śarīravyāptyākāśavadvyānastatra yat spandanaṃ tat karaṇajālasya sāmānyā vṛttiriti /
GSP31iskgaudu:540: evamete pañca vāyavaḥ sāmānyakaraṇavṛttiriti vyākhyātāḥ trayodaśavidhasyāpi karaṇasāmānyā vṛttirityarthaḥ // 29 //
GSP31iskgaudu:541: yugapaccatuṣṭayasya tu vṛttiḥ kramaśaśca tasya nirdiṣṭā /
GSP31iskgaudu:542: dṛṣṭe tathāpyadṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiḥ // ISk_30 //
GSP31iskgaudu:543: yugapaccatuṣṭayasya buddhyahaṃkāramanasāmekaikendriyasambandhe sati catuṣṭayaṃ bhavati catuṣṭayasya dṛṣṭe prativiṣayādhyavasāye yugapadvṛtirbuddhyahaṃkāramanaścakṣūṃṣi yugapadekakālaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati sthāṇurayamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:547: / kiṃca kramaśaśca tasya nirdiṣṭā tasyeti catuṣṭayasyakramaśaśca
GSP31iskgaudu:549: yathā kaścit pathi gacchan dūrādeva dṛṣṭvā sthāṇurayaṃ puruṣo veti saṃśaye sati tatroparūḍhāṃ valliṃ talliṅgaṃ paśyati śakuniṃ vā tato tasya manasā saṃkalpite saṃśaye vyavacchedabhūtā buddhirbhavati sthāṇurayamityato 'haṃkāraśca niścayārthaḥ sthāṇurevetyevaṃ buddhyahaṃkāramanaścakṣuṣāṃ kramaśo vṛttirdṛṣṭā yathā rūpe tathā
GSP31iskgaudu:551: kiṃcānyattathāpyadṛṣṭe trayasya tatpūrvikā vṛttiradṛṣṭe 'nāgate 'tīte ca kāle buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ rūpe cakṣuḥ pūrvikā trayasya vṛttiḥ sparśe tvakpūrvikā gandhe ghrāṇapūrvikā
GSP31iskgaudu:552: rase rasanapūrvikā śabde śravaṇapūrvikā buddhyahaṃkāramanasāmanāgate bhaviṣyati kāle 'tīte ca tat kramaśo vṛttirvarttamāne yugapat kramaśaśceti
GSP31iskgaudu:555: puruṣārtha eva heturna kenacitkāryate karaṇam // ISk_31 //
GSP31iskgaudu:556: svāṃ svāmiti vīpsā buddhyahaṃkāramanāṃsi svāṃ svāṃ vṛttiṃ parasparākūtahetukāmākūtakādarāsambhrama iti pratipadyante puruṣārthakaraṇāya /
GSP31iskgaudu:557: buddherahaṃkārādayo buddhirahaṃkārākūtaṃ jñātvā svasvaviṣayaṃ pratipadyate kimarthamiti cet puruṣārtha eva hetuḥ puruṣārthaḥ karttavya ityevamarthaṃ guṇānāṃ pravṛttistasmādetāni karaṇāni puruṣārthaṃ prakāśayanti kathaṃ svayaṃ pravartante na kenacit kāryate karaṇaṃ puruṣārtha evaikaḥ kārayatīti vākyārtho na kenacidīśvareṇa puruṣeṇa kāryate prabodhyate karaṇam // 31 //
GSP31iskgaudu:560: kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhāhāryaṃ dhāryaṃ prakāśyaṃ ca // ISk_32 //
GSP31iskgaudu:561: karaṇaṃ mahadādi trayodaśavidhaṃ boddhyavyaṃ pañcabuddhīndriyāṇi cakṣurādīni pañca karmendriyāṇi vāgādīnīti trayodaśavidhaṃ karaṇaṃ tatkiṃ karotītyetadāha tadāharaṇadhāraṇaprakāśakaram /
GSP31iskgaudu:562: tatrāharaṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ ca karmendriyāṇi kurvanti prakāśaṃ buddhīndriyāṇi /
GSP31iskgaudu:564: kāryaṃ ca tasya daśadhā tasya karaṇasya kāryaṃ kartavyamiti daśadhā daśaprakāraṃ śabdasparśarūparasagandhākhyaṃ vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandākhyametaddaśavidhaṃ kāryaṃ buddhīndriyaiḥ prakāśitaṃ karmendriyāṇyāharanti dhārayanti ceti // 32 //
GSP31iskgaudu:565: antaḥkaraṇaṃ trividhaṃ daśadhā bāhyaṃ trayasya viṣayākhyam /
GSP31iskgaudu:568: daśadhā bāhyaṃ ca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇi pañca daśavidhametatkaraṇaṃ bāhyaṃ tatra yasyāntaḥkaraṇasya viṣayākhyaṃ buddhyahaṃkāramanasāṃ bhogyaṃ sāmpratakālaṃ śrotraṃ varttamānameva śabdaṃ śṛṇoti nātītaṃ na ca bhaviṣyantaṃ cakṣurapi vartamānaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ tvagvarttamānaṃ sparśaṃ jihvā varttamānaṃ rasaṃ nāsikā varttamānaṃ gandhaṃ nātītānāgataṃ ceti evaṃ karmendriyāṇi vāgvarttamānaṃ śabdamuccārayati nātītaṃ nānāgataṃ pāṇī varttamānaṃ ghaṭamādadāte nātītamanāgataṃ pāyūpasthau ca varttamānāvutsargānandau kuruto nātītau nānāgatau /
GSP31iskgaudu:569: evaṃ bāhyaṃ karaṇaṃ sāmpratakālamuktaṃ trikālamābhyantaraṃ karaṇaṃ buddhyahaṃkāramanāṃsi trikālaviṣayāṇi buddhirvarttamānaṃ ghaṭaṃ budhyate atītamanāgataṃ ceti /
GSP31iskgaudu:571: / tathā mano varttamāne saṃkalpaṃ kurute atīte 'nāgate ca evaṃ trikālamābhyantaraṃ karaṇamiti idānīmindriyāṇi kati saviśeṣaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhṇanti kāni nirviśeṣamiti taducyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:574: buddhīndriyāṇi tāni saviśeṣaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti saviśeṣaviṣayaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ śabdasparśarūparasagandhān sukhaduḥkhamohaviṣayayuktān buddhīndriyāṇi prakāśayanti devānāṃ nirviśeṣānviṣayān prakāśayanti tathā karmendriyāṇāṃ madhye vāgbhavati śabdaviṣayā devānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca vāgvadati ślokādīnuccārayati tasmāddevānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca vāgindriyaṃ tulyaṃ śeṣāṇyapi vāgvyatiriktāni pāṇipādapāyūpasthasaṃjñitāni pañcaviṣayāṇi śabdādayo yeṣāṃ tāni pañcaviṣayāṇi śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ pāṇau santi pañcaśabdādilakṣaṇāyāṃ bhuvi pādo viharati pāyvindriyaṃ pañcaklṛptamutsargaṃ karoti tathopasthendriyaṃ pañcalakṣaṇaṃ śukramānandayati // 34 //
GSP31iskgaudu:576: tasmāttrividhaṃ karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi // ISk_35 //
GSP31iskgaudu:577: sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhirahaṃkāramanaḥsahitetyarthaha yasmāt sarvaṃ viṣayamavagāhate gṛhṇāti triṣvapi kāleṣu śabdādīn gṛhṇāti tasmāttrividhama karaṇaṃ dvāri dvārāṇi śeṣāṇi śeṣāni karaṇānīti vākyaśeṣaḥ kiṃ cānyat /
GSP31iskgaudu:579: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti // ISk_36 //
GSP31iskgaudu:580: yāni karaṇānyuktāni ete guṇaviśeṣāḥ kiṃ viśiṣṭāḥ pradīpakalpāḥ pradīpavadviṣayaprakāśakāḥ parasparavilakṣaṇā asadṛśā bhinnaviṣayā ityarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:583: kṛtsnaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ buddhīndriyāni karmendriyāṇyahaṃkāro manaścaitāni svaṃ svamarthaṃ puruṣasya prakāśya buddhau prayacchanti buddhisthaṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:584: yato buddhisthaṃ sarvaṃ viṣayaṃ sukhādikaṃ puruṣa upalabhyate // 36 //
GSP31iskgaudu:587: saiva ca viśinaṣṭi tataḥ pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ sūkṣmam // ISk_37 //
GSP31iskgaudu:588: sarvendriyagataṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu sarvaṃ pratyupabhogamupabhogaṃ prati devamanuṣyatiryag buddhīndriyakarmendriyadvāreṇa sāntaḥkaraṇā buddhiḥ sādhayati sampādayati yasmāt tasmāt saiva ca viśinaṣṭi pradhānapuruṣayorviṣayavibhāgaṃ karoti pradhānapuruṣāntaraṃ nānātvamityarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:589: sūkṣmamityanadhikṛtatapaścaraṇairaprāpyamiyaṃ prakṛtiḥ sattvarajastamasāṃ sāmyāvasthā iyaṃ buddhirayamahaṃkāra etāni pañcatanmātrāṇyekādaśendriyāṇi pañcamahābhūtānyayamanyaḥ puruṣa ebhyo vyatirikta ityeva bodhayati buddhiryasyāvāyādapavargo bhavati // 37 //
GSP31iskgaudu:590: pūrvamuktaṃ viśeṣāviśeṣaviṣayāṇi tat ke viṣayāstacca darśayati /
GSP31iskgaudu:592: ete smṛtā viśeṣāḥ śāntā ghorāśca mūḍhāśca // ISk_38 //
GSP31iskgaudu:593: yāni pañca tanmātrāṇyahaṃkārādutpadyante te śabdatanmātraṃ sparśatanmātraṃ rūpatanmātraṃ rasatanmātraṃ gandhatanmātrametānyaviśeṣā ucyante devānāmete sukhalakṣaṇā viṣayā duḥkhamoharahitāstebhyaḥ pañcabhyastanmātrebhyaḥ pañcamahābhūtāni pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśasaṃjñitāni yānyutpadyante /
GSP31iskgaudu:595: gandhatanmātrāt pṛthivī rasatanmātrādāpo rūpatanmātrāttejaḥ sparśatanmātrādvāyuḥ śabdatanmātrādākāśamityevamutpannānyetāni mahābhūtānyete viśeṣā mānuṣāṇāṃ viṣayāḥ śāntā sukhalakṣaṇā ghorā duḥkhalakṣaṇā mūḍhā mohajanakā yathākāśaṃ kasyacidanavakāśādantargṛhādernirgatasya sukhātmakaṃ śāntaṃ bhavati tadeva śītoṣṇavātavarṣābhibhūtasya duḥkhātmakaṃ ghoraṃ bhavati tadeva panthānaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:596: gacchato vanamārgāt bhraṣṭasya diṅ mohānmūḍhaṃ bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:597: evaṃ vāyurgharmārtasya śānto bhavati śītārtasya ghoro dhūlīśarkarāvimiśro
GSP31iskgaudu:601: sūkṣmā mātāpitṛjāḥ saha prabhūtaistridhā viśeṣāḥ syuḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:603: sūkṣmāstanmātrāṇi yatsaṃgṛhītaṃ tanmātrikaṃ sūkṣmaśarīraṃ mahadādiliṅgaṃ sadā tiṣṭhati saṃsarati ca te sūkṣmāstathā mātāpitṛjā sthūlaśarīropacāyakā ṛtukāle mātāpitṛsaṃyoge śoṇitaśukramiśrībhāvenodarāntaḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:604: sūkṣmaśarīrasyopacayaṃ kurvīta tat sūkṣmaśarīraṃ punarmāturaśitapītanānāvidharasena nābhīnibandhenāpyāyate tathā prārabdhaṃ śarīraṃ sūkṣmairmātāpitṛjaiśca saha mahābhūtaistrividhā viśeṣaiḥ pṛṣṭhodarajaṃghākaṭyuraḥ śiraḥ prabhṛti ṣāṭ kauśikaṃ pañcabhautikaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:606: tejaḥ pākādāpaḥ saṃgrahātpṛthivī dhāraṇāt samastāvayavopetaṃ māturudarādbahirbhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:608: atrāha ke nityāḥ ke vānityāḥ sūkṣmāsteṣāṃ niyatāḥ sūkṣmāstanmātrasaṃjñakāsteṣāṃ madhye niyatā nityāstairārabdhaṃ śarīraṃ karmavaśāt paśumṛgapakṣisarīsṛpasthāvarajātiṣu saṃsarati dharmavaśādindrakādilokeṣvevametanniyataṃ sūkṣmaśarīraṃ sarati yāvat jñānamutpadyate utpanne jñāne vidvāṃñcharīraṃ tyaktvā mokṣaṃ gacchati tasmādete viśeṣā sūkṣmā nityā iti mātāpitṛjā nivartante tat sūkṣmaśarīraṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:609: parityajyehaiva prāṇatyāgavelāyāṃ mātāpitṛjā nivartante maraṇakāle mātāpitṛjaṃ śarīramihaiva nivarttya bhūmyādiṣu pralīyate yathā tattvaṃ //
GSP31iskgaudu:614: kiṃcānyadasaktaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ tiryagyonidevamānuṣasthāneṣu sūkṣmatvāt kutracidasaktaṃ parvatādiṣvapratihataprasaraṃ sarti gacchati /
GSP31iskgaudu:615: nityaṃ yāvannajñānamutpadyate tāvat saṃsarati tacca mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ mahānādau yasya tanmahadādi buddhirahaṃkāro mana iti pañca tanmātrāṇi sūkṣmaparyantaṃ tanmātraparyantaṃ saṃsarati śūlagrahapipīlikāvat trīnapi lokān /
GSP31iskgaudu:616: nirupabhogaṃ bhogarahitaṃ tat sūkṣmaśarīraṃ pitṛmātṛjena bāhyenopacayena kriyādharmagrahaṇāt bhogeṣu samarthaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:618: pralayakāle mahadādisūkṣmaparyantaṃ karaṇopetaṃ pradhāne līyate asaṃsaraṇayuktaṃ sadā sargakālamatra varttate prakṛtimohabandhanabaddhaṃ sat saṃsaraṇādikriyāsvasamarthamiti punaḥ sargakāle saṃsarati tasmālliṃgaṃ sūkṣmam // 40 //
GSP31iskgaudu:619: kiṃ prayojanena trayodaśavidhaṃ karaṇaṃ saṃsaratītyevaṃ codite satyāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:620: citraṃ yathāśrayamṛte sthāṇvādibhyo yathā vinā chāyā /
GSP31iskgaudu:621: tadvadvinā viśeṣaistiṣṭhati na nirāśrayaṃ liṅgam // ISk_41 //
GSP31iskgaudu:622: citraṃ yathā kuḍyāśrayamṛte na tiṣṭhati sthāṇvādibhyaḥ kīlakādibhyo vinā chāyā na tiṣṭhati tairvinā na bhavatyādigrahaṇādyathā śaityaṃ vinā nāpo bhavanti śaityaṃ vādbhirvinā /
GSP31iskgaudu:623: agniruṣṇaṃ vinā vāyuḥ sparśaṃ vinā ākāśamavakāśaṃ vinā pṛthivī gandhaṃ vinā tadvadetena dṛṣṭāntena nyāyana vinā viśeṣairaviśeṣaistanmātrairvinā na tiṣṭhati /
GSP31iskgaudu:624: atha viśeṣabhūtānyucyante śarīraṃ pañcabhūtamayaṃ vaiśeṣiṇā śarīreṇa vinā kva liṅgasthānaṃ ceti kva ekadehamujjhati tadevānyamāśrayati nirāśrayamāśrayarahitaṃ liṅgaṃ trayodaśa vidhaṃ karaṇamityarthaḥ // 41 //
GSP31iskgaudu:628: puruṣārthaḥ kartavya iti pradhānaṃ pravarttate sa ca dvividhaḥ śabdādyupalabdhilakṣaṇo guṇapuruṣāntaro labdhilakṣaṇaśca /
GSP31iskgaudu:629: śabdādyupalabdhirbrahmādiṣu lokeṣu gandhādibhogāvāptiḥ guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhirmokṣa iti tasamāduktaṃ puruṣārthahetukamidaṃ sūkṣmaśarīraṃ pravarttata iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:630: nimittanaimittikaprasaṃgena nimittaṃ dharmādi naimittikamūrddhvagamanādi purastādeva vakṣyāmaḥ prasaṃgena prasaktyā prakṛteḥ pradhānasya vibhutvayogādyathā rājā svarāṣṭre
GSP31iskgaudu:631: vibhutvādyadyadicchati tattat karotīti tathā prakṛteḥ sarvatra vibhutvayogānnimittanaimittakaṃ prasaṃgena vyavatiṣṭhate pṛthak pṛthagdehadhāraṇe liṅgasya vyavasthāṃ karoti /
GSP31iskgaudu:632: liṃgaṃ sūkṣmaḥ paramāṇubhistanmātrairūpacitaṃ śarīraṃ trayodaśavidhakaraṇopetaṃ mānuṣadevatiryagyoniṣu vyavatiṣṭhate kathaṃ naṭavat yathā naṭaḥ paṭāntareṇa praviśya devo bhūtvā nirgacchati punarmānuṣaḥ punarvidūṣakaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:633: evaṃ liṃgaṃ nimittanaimittikaprasaṃgenodarāntaḥ praviśya hastī strī pumān bhavati // 42 //
GSP31iskgaudu:634: bhāvairadhivāsitaṃ liṃgaṃ saṃsaratītyuktaṃ tat ke bhāvā ityāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:638: tatra sāṃsiddhikā yathā bhavagataḥ kapilasyādisarge utpadyamānasya catvāro bhāvāḥ sahotpannāḥ dharmo jñānaṃ vairāgyamaiśvaryamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:639: prākṛtāḥ kathyante brahmaṇaścatvāraḥ putrāḥ sanakasanandanasanātanasanatkumārā babhūvuḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:640: teṣāmutpannakāryakāraṇānāṃ śarīriṇāṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣāṇāmete bhāvāścatvāraḥ samutpannāstasmādete prākṛtāḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:641: tathā vaikṛtā yathā ācāryamūrttiṃ nimittaṃ kṛtvāsmadādīnāṃ jñānamutpadyate jñānādvairāgyaṃ vairāgyāddharmo dharmādaiśvaryamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:642: ācāryamūrttirapi vikṛtiriti tasmādvaikṛtā ete bhāvā ucyante yairadhivāsitaṃ liṅgaṃ saṃsarati ete catvāro bhāvāḥ sātvikāstāmasāviparītāḥ sāttvikametadrūpaṃ tāmasamasmādviparyastamityatra vyākhyātā evamaṣṭau dharmo jñānaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:644: etaduktamadhyavasāyo buddhiḥ dharmo jñānamiti kāryaṃ dehastadāśrayāḥ kalalādyā ye mātṛjā ityuktāḥ śukraśoṇitasaṃyoge vivṛddhihetukāḥ kalalādyā budbudamāṃsapeśīprabhṛtayaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:645: tathā kaumārayauvanasthaviratvādayo bhāvā annapānarasanimittā niṣpadyanta ataḥ kāryāśrayiṇa ucyanta annādiviṣayabhoganimittā jāyante // 43 //
GSP31iskgaudu:649: dharmeṇa gamanamūrddhvaṃ dharmaṃ nimittaṃ kṛtvorddhvamupanayati ūrddhvamityaṣṭau sthānāni gṛhyante /
GSP31iskgaudu:651: brāhmaṃ prājāpatyaṃ saumyamaindraṃ gāndharvaṃ rākṣasaṃ paiśācamiti tat sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ gacchati paśumṛgapakṣisarīsṛpasthāvarānteṣvadharmo nimittam /
GSP31iskgaudu:652: kiṃca jñānena cāpavargaśca pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānaṃ tena nimittenāpavargo mokṣaḥ tataḥ sūkṣmaṃ śarīraṃ nivartate paramātmā ucyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:653: viparyayādiṣyate bandhaḥ ajñānaṃ nimittaṃ sa caiṣa naimittikaḥ prākṛto vaikāriko dākṣiṇikaśca bandha iti vakṣyati purastāt yadidamuktam /
GSP31iskgaudu:660: yathā kasyacidvairāgyamasti na tattvajñānaṃ tasmādajñānapūrvādvairāgyāt prakṛtilayo mṛto 'ṣṭāsu prakṛtiṣu pradhānabuddhyahaṅkāratanmātreṣu līyate
GSP31iskgaudu:663: dakṣiṇāṃ dadāmi yenāmuṣmiṃlloke 'tra yaddivyaṃ mānuṣaṃ sukhamanubhavāmyetasmādrājasādrāgāt saṃsāro bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:664: tathā aiśvaryādavighātaḥ etadaiśvaryamaṣṭaguṇamaṇimādiyuktaṃ tasmādaiśvaryanimittādavighāto naimittiko bhavati brāhmādiṣu sthāneṣvaiśvaryaṃ na vihanyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:665: kiṃcānyadviparyayādviparyāsaḥ tasyāvighātastasya viparyāso vighāto bhavatyanaiśvaryāt sarvatra
GSP31iskgaudu:666: / kiṃcānyadviparyādviparyāsaḥ syāvighātasya viparyāso vighāto bhavatyanaiśvaryāt sarvatra vihanyate // 45 //
GSP31iskgaudu:667: eṣa nimittaiḥ saha naimittikaḥ ṣoḍaśavidho vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:671: yathā eṣa ṣoḍaśavidho nimittanaimittabhedo vyākhyāta eṣa pratyayasarga ucyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:672: pratyayo buddhirityuktādhyavasāyo buddhirdharmo jñānamityādi sa ca pratyayasargaścaturdhā bhidyate viparyayāśaktituṣṭisiddhākhyabhedāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:674: yathā kasyacit sthāṇudarśane sthāṇurayaṃ puruṣo veti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:676: tameva sthāṇuṃ samyadgṛṣṭvā saṃśayaṃ chettuṃ na śaknotītyaśaktiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:678: tameva sthāṇuṃ jñātuṃ saṃśayituṃ vā necchati kimanenāsmākamityeṣā tuṣṭiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:680: ānanditendriyaḥ sthāṇumārūḍhāṃ valliṃ paśyati śakuniṃ vā tasya siddhirbhavati sthāṇurayamiti
GSP31iskgaudu:681: evamasya caturvidhasya pratyayasargasya guṇavaiṣamyavimardde tasya bhedāstu pañcāśat yo 'yaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:682: sattvarajastamoguṇānāṃ vaiṣamyo vimarddaḥ tena tasya pratyayasargasya pañcāśadbhedā bhavanti tathā kvāpi sattvamutkaṭaṃ rajastamasī udāsīne kvāpi rajaḥ kvāpi tama iti // 46 //
GSP31iskgaudu:686: pañca viparyayabhedāste yathā tamo moho mahāmohastāmisro 'ndhatāmisra
GSP31iskgaudu:688: aśaktestvaṣṭāviṃśatibhedā bhavanti karaṇavaikalyāt tānapi vakṣyāmastathā ca tuṣṭirnavadhā ūrddhvasrotasi rājasāni jñānāni /
GSP31iskgaudu:694: tamasastāvadaṣṭadhā bhedaḥ pralayo 'jñānādvibhajyate so 'ṣṭāsu prakṛtiṣu līyate pradhānabuddhyahaṃkārapañcatanmātrāṣṭāsu tatra līnamātmānaṃ manyate
GSP31iskgaudu:695: mukto 'hamiti tamo bheda eṣo 'ṣṭavidhasya mohasya bhedo 'ṣṭavidha
GSP31iskgaudu:697: yatrāṣṭaguṇamaṇimādyaiśvaryaṃ tatra saṃgādindrādayo devā na mokṣaṃ prāpnuvanti punaśca tat kṣaye saṃsarantyeṣo 'ṣṭavidho moha iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:698: daśavidho mahāmohaḥ śabdasparśarūparasagandhā devānāmete pañcaviṣayāḥ sukhalakṣaṇāḥ mānuṣāṇāmapyete eva śabdādayaḥ pañca viṣayā evameteṣu daśasu mahāmoha iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:699: tāmisro 'ṣṭadaśadhāṣṭāvidhamaiśvaryaṃ dṛṣṭānuśravikā viṣayā daśa eteṣāmaṣṭādaśānāṃ sampadamanunandanti vipadaṃ nānumodantyeṣo 'ṣṭādaśavidho vikalpastāmisro /
GSP31iskgaudu:700: tathā tāmisramaṣṭaguṇamaiśvaryaṃ dṛṣṭānuśravikā daśaviṣayāstathāndhatāmisro 'pyaṣṭādaśabheda eva kiṃtu viṣayasampattau sambhogakāle ya eva mriyate 'ṣṭaguṇaiśvaryādvā bhraśyate tatastasya mahadduḥkhamutpadyate so 'ndhatāmisra iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:701: evaṃ viparyayabhedāstamaḥ prabhṛtayaḥ pañca pratyekaṃ bhidyamānā dviṣaṣṭibhedāḥ saṃvṛttā iti aśaktibhedāḥ kathyante /
GSP31iskgaudu:704: bhavantyaśakteśca karaṇavaikalyādaṣṭāviṃśatibhedā ityuddiṣṭaṃ tatraikādaśendriyavadhāḥ bādhiryamandhatāprasuptirupahvikāghrāṇapāko mūkatā kuṇitvaṃ khāṃjyaṃ klaibyamunmāda iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:705: saha buddhivadhairaśaktiruddiṣṭā ye buddhivadhāstaiḥ sahāśakteraṣṭāviṃśatibhedā bhavanti saptadaśavadhā buddheḥ saptadaśavadhāste tuṣṭibhedasiddhibhedavaiparītyena tuṣṭibhedā nava siddhibhedā aṣṭau ye te viparītaiḥ saha ekādaśa vidhā evamaṣṭāviṃśativikalpā aśaktiriti viparyayāt siddhituṣṭīnāmeva bhedakramo draṣṭavyaḥ // 49 //
GSP31iskgaudu:708: bāhyā viṣayoparamātpañca nava ca tuṣṭayo 'bhihitāḥ // ISk_50 //
GSP31iskgaudu:711: tatra prakṛtyākhyā yathā kaścit prakṛtiṃ vetti tasyāḥ saguṇanirguṇatvaṃ ca tena tattvaṃ tat kāryaṃ vijñāyaiva kevalaṃ tuṣṭastasya nāsti mokṣa eṣā prakṛtyākhyā /
GSP31iskgaudu:712: upādānākhyā yathā kaścidavijñāyaiva tattvānyupādānagrahaṇaṃ karoti tridaṇḍakamaṇḍaluvividikābhyo mokṣa iti tasyāpi nāstyeṣā upādānākhyā /
GSP31iskgaudu:713: tathā kālākhyā kālena mokṣo bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ tattvābhyāsenetyeṣā kālākhyā tuṣṭistasya nāsti mokṣa iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:714: tathā bhāgyākhyā bhāgyenaiva mokṣo bhaviṣyatīti bhāgyākhyā /
GSP31iskgaudu:718: vṛddhinimittaṃ pāśupālyavāṇijyapratigrahasevāḥ kāryā etadarjanaṃ duḥkhamarjitānāṃ rakṣaṇe duḥkhamupabhogāt kṣīyata iti kṣayaduḥkham /
GSP31iskgaudu:719: tathā viṣayopabhogasaṃge kṛte nāstīndriyāṇāmupaśama iti saṃgadoṣaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:720: tathā na anupahatya bhūtānyupabhoga ityeṣa hiṃsādoṣaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:723: ambhaḥ salilamogho vṛṣṭiḥ sutamo pāraṃ sunetraṃ nārīkamanuttamāṃbhasikamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:728: dānaṃ ca siddhayo 'ṣṭau siddheḥ pūrvo 'ṅkuśastrividhaḥ // ISk_51 //
GSP31iskgaudu:729: ūho yathā kaścinnatyamūhate kimiha satyaṃ kiṃ paraṃ kiṃ naiśreyasaṃ kiṃ kṛtārthaḥ syāmiti cintayato jñānamutpadyate pradhānādanya eva puruṣa ityanyā buddhiranyo 'haṃkāro 'nyāni tanmātrāṇīndriyāṇi pañcamahābhūtānītyevaṃ tattvajñānamutpadyate yena mokṣo bhavati eṣā ūhākhyā prathamā siddhiḥ tathā śabdajñānāt pradhānapuruṣabuddhyahaṃkāratanmātrendriyapañcamahābhūtaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati tato mokṣa ityeṣā śabdākhyā siddhiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:730: adhyayanādvedādiśāstrādhyayanāt pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānaṃ prāpya mokṣaṃ yāti ityeṣā tṛtīyā siddhiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:731: duḥkhavighātatrayamādhyātmikādhibhautikādhidaivikaduḥkhatrayavighātāya guruṃ samupagamya tata upadeśānmokṣaṃ yātyeṣā caturthī siddhiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:732: eṣaiva duḥkhatrayabhedāt tridhā kalpanīyā iti ṣaṭ siddhayaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:733: tathā suhṛtprāptiryathā kaścit suhṛt jñānamadhigamya mokṣaṃ gacchati eṣā saptamī siddhiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:734: dānaṃ yathā kaścidbhagavatāṃ pratyāśrayauṣadhitridaṇḍakuṇḍikādīnāṃ grāsācchādanādīnāṃ ca dānenopakṛtya tebhyo jñānamavāpya mokṣaṃ yātyeṣāṣṭamī siddhiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:735: āsāmaṣṭānāṃ siddhīnāṃ śāstrāntare saṃjñāḥ kṛtāstāraṃ sutāraṃ tāratāraṃ pramodaṃ pramuditaṃ pramodamānaṃ ramyakaṃ sadāpramuditamiti /
GSP31iskgaudu:736: āsāṃ viparyayāt budderbandhā ye viparītāsta aśaktau nikṣiptā yathātāramasutāramatāratāramityādidraṣṭavyamaśaktibhedā aṣṭāviṃśatiruktāste saha buddhibandhairekādaśendriyabandhā iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:737: tatra tuṣṭiviparyayā nava siddhīnāṃ viparyayā aṣṭau evamete saptadaśa buddhibandhā etaiḥ sahendriyabandhā aṣṭāviṃśatiraśaktibhedāḥ paścāt kathitā iti viparyayāśaktituṣṭisiddhīnāmevoddeśo nirdeśaśca kṛta iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:738: kiṃ cānyat siddheḥ pūrvo 'ṅkuśastrividhaḥ siddheḥ pūrvā yā
GSP31iskgaudu:739: viparyayāśaktituṣṭayastā eva siddheraṃkuśastadbhedādevaṃ trividho yathā hastī gṛhītāṃkuśena vaśo bhavatyeva viparyayāśaktituṣṭibhirgṛhīto loko
GSP31iskgaudu:740: 'jñānamāpnoti tasmādetāḥ parityajya siddhiḥ sevyā sasiddhestattvajñānamutpadyate tanmokṣa iti // 51 //
GSP31iskgaudu:741: atha yaduktaṃ bhāvairadhivāsitaṃ liṃgaṃ tatra bhāvā dharmādayo 'ṣṭāvuktā
GSP31iskgaudu:742: buddhipariṇāmā viparyayāśaktituṣṭisiddhipariṇatāḥ sa bhāvākhyaḥ pratyayasargaḥ liṃgaṃ ca tanmātrasargaścaturdaśabhūtaparyanta uktastatraikenaiva sargeṇa puruṣārthasiddhau kimubhayavidhasargeṇetyata āha /
GSP31iskgaudu:743: na vinā bhāvairliṅgaṃ na vinā liṅgena bhāvanirvṛttiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:745: bhāvaiḥ pratyayasargairvinā liṃgaṃ na tanmātrasargo na pūrvapūrvasaṃskārādṛṣṭakāritatvāduttarottaradehalambhasya liṃgena tanmātrasargeṇa ca vinā bhāvanirvṛttirna sthūlasūkṣmadehasādhyatvāddharmāderanāditvācca sargasya bījāṃkurāvanyonyāśrayau na doṣāya tattajjātīyāpekṣitatve 'pi
GSP31iskgaudu:746: tattadvyaktīnāṃ parasparānapekṣitvāttasmādbhāvākhyo liṃgākhyaśca dvividhaḥ pravarttate sarga iti // 52 //
GSP31iskgaudu:750: tatra daivamaṣṭaprakāraṃ brāhmaṃ prājāpatyaṃ saumyamaindraṃ gāndharvaṃ yākṣaṃ rākṣasaṃ paiśācamiti
GSP31iskgaudu:753: triṣvapi lokeṣu guṇatrayamasti tatra kasmin kimadhikamucyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:756: ūrddhvamityaṣṭasu devasthāneṣu sattvaviśālaṃ sattvavistāraḥ sattvotkaṭa ūrddhvasattva iti
GSP31iskgaudu:758: tamoviśālo mūlataḥ paśvādiṣu sthāvarānteṣu sarvaḥsargastamasādhikyena vyāptastatrāpi sattvarajasī staḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:759: madhye mānuṣye raja utkaṭaṃ tatrāpi sattvatamasī vidyete tasmādduḥkhaprāyā manuṣyāḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:761: evamabhautikaḥ sargo liṃgasargo bhāvasargo bhūtasargo daivamānuṣatairyagyonaya ityeṣaḥ pradhānakṛtaḥ ṣoḍaśaḥ sargaḥ // 54 //
GSP31iskgaudu:762: tatra jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti cetanaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:764: tatreti teṣu devamānuṣatiryagyoniṣu jarākṛtaṃ maraṇakṛtaṃ caiva duḥkhaṃ cetanaḥ caitanyavān puruṣaḥ prāpnoti na pradhānaṃ na buddhirnāhaṃkāro na tanmātrāṇīndriyāṇi mahābhūtāni ca /
GSP31iskgaudu:765: kiyantaṃ kālaṃ puruṣo duḥkhaṃ prāpnotīti tadvivinakti /
GSP31iskgaudu:766: liṃgasyāvinivṛtteryattanmahadādi liṃgaśarīreṇāviśya tatra vyaktībhavati tadyāvannivarttate saṃsāraśarīramiti saṃkṣepeṇa triṣu sthāneṣu puruṣo jarāmaraṇakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpnoti liṃgasyāvinivṛtteḥ liṃgasya vinivṛttiṃ yāvat /
GSP31iskgaudu:768: tatpunaḥ kena nivarttate yadā pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānaṃ syāt sattvapuruṣānyathākhyātilakṣaṇamidaṃ pradhānamiyaṃ buddhirayamahaṃkāra imāni pañcatanmātrāṇyekādaśendriyāṇi pañca mahābhūtāni yebhyo 'nyaḥ puruṣo visadṛśa ityevaṃ
GSP31iskgaudu:772: pratipuruṣavimokṣārthaṃ svārtha iva parārtha ārambhaḥ // ISk_56 //
GSP31iskgaudu:773: ityeṣa parisamāptau nirddeśe ca prakṛtivikṛtau prakṛtikaraṇe prakṛtikriyāyāṃ ya ārambho mahadādiviśeṣabhūtaparyantaḥ prakṛtermahān mahato 'haṃkārastasmāttanmātrāṇyekādaśendriyāṇi tanmātrebhyaḥ pañcamahābhūtānītyeṣaḥ pratipuruṣavimokṣārthaṃ puruṣaṃ prati devamanuṣyatiryagbhāvaṃ gatānāṃ vimokṣārthamārambhaḥ kathaṃ svārtha iva
GSP31iskgaudu:774: parārthamārambhaḥ yathā kaścit svārthaṃ tyaktvā mitrakāryāṇi karoti evaṃ pradhānam /
GSP31iskgaudu:775: puruṣo 'tra pradhānasya na kiñcit pratyupakāraṃ karoti /
GSP31iskgaudu:776: svārtha iva na ca svāthaḥ parārtha evārthaḥ śabdādiviṣayopalabdhirguṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhiśca triṣu lokeṣu śabdādiviṣayaiḥ puruṣā yojayitavyā ante ca mokṣeṇeti pradhānasya pravṛttistathā coktam /
GSP31iskgaudu:777: kumbhavat pradhānaṃ puruṣārthaṃ kṛtvā nivarttata iti // 56 //
GSP31iskgaudu:778: atrocyate 'cetanaṃ pradhānaṃ cetanaḥ puruṣa iti mayā triṣu lokeṣu śabdādibhirviṣayaiḥ puruṣo yojyo 'nte mokṣaḥ karttavya iti kathaṃ cetanavat pravṛtiḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:782: yathā tṛṇādikaṃ gavā bhakṣitaṃ kṣīrabhāvena pariṇamya vatsavivṛddhiṃ karoti puṣṭe ca vatse nivarttata evaṃ puruṣavimokṣanimittaṃ pradhānam /
GSP31iskgaudu:787: yathā loka ityaustukye sati tasya nivṛttyarthaṃ kriyāsu pravarttate gamanāgamanakriyāsu kṛtakāryo nivarttate tathā puruṣasya vimokṣārthaṃ śabdādiviṣayopabhogopalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhilakṣaṇaṃ ca dvividhamapi puruṣārthaṃ kṛtvā pradhānaṃ nivartate // 58 //
GSP31iskgaudu:789: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt /
GSP31iskgaudu:790: puruṣasya tathātmānaṃ prakāśya nivartate prakṛtiḥ // ISk_59 //
GSP31iskgaudu:791: yathā narttakī śṛṅgārādirasauritihāsādibhāvaiśca nibaddhagītavāditravṛttāni raṅgasya darśayitvā kṛtakāryā nṛtyānnivarttate tathā prakṛtirapi puruṣasyātmānaṃ prakāśya buddhyahaṃkāratanmātrendiyamahābhūtabhedena nivartate // 59 //
GSP31iskgaudu:795: nānāvidhairupāyaiḥ prakṛtiḥ puruṣasyopakāriṇyanupakāriṇaḥ puṃsaḥ kathaṃ devamānuṣatiryagbhāvena sukhaduḥkhamohātmakabhāvena śabdādiviṣayabhāvena evaṃ nānāvidhairupāyairātmānaṃ prakāśyāhamanyā tvamanya iti nivarttate 'to
GSP31iskgaudu:796: nityasya tasyārthamapārthaṃ kurute carati ca yathā kaścit paropakārī sarvasyopakurute nātmanaḥ pratyupakāramīhata evaṃ prakṛtiḥ puruṣārthaṃ kurute karotyapārthakam // 60 //
GSP31iskgaudu:797: paścāduktamātmānaṃ prakāśya nivarttate nivṛtta ca kiṃ karotītyāha /
GSP31iskgaudu:798: prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcidastīti me matirbhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:799: yā dṛṣṭāsmīti punarna darśanamupaiti puruṣasya // ISk_61 //
GSP31iskgaudu:800: loke prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcidastītyevaṃ me matirbhavati yena parārtha evaṃ matirutpannā kasmādahamanena puruṣeṇa dṛṣṭāsmītyasya puṃso punardarśanaṃ nopaiti puruṣasyādarśanamupayātītyarthaḥ tatra sukumārataraṃ varṇayati /
GSP31iskgaudu:803: 'yamātmā naḥ sukhaduḥkhayorīśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ narakameva vā //”
GSP31iskgaudu:805: kena śuklīkṛtā haṃsā mayūrāḥ kena citritāḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:807: atra sāṃkhyācāryā āhuḥ nirguṇatvādīśvarasya kathaṃ saguṇataḥ prajā jāyeran kathaṃ vā puruṣānnirguṇādeva tasmāt prakṛteryujyate yathā śuklebhyastantubhyaḥ śukla eva paṭo bhavati kṛṣṇebhyaḥ kṛṣṇa eveti /
GSP31iskgaudu:808: evaṃ triguṇāt pradhānāt trayo lokāstriguṇāḥ samutpannā iti gamyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:813: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgartti kālo hi duratikramaḥ //” vyaktamavyaktapuruṣāstrayaḥ padārthāstena kālo 'ntarbhūto 'sti sa vyaktaḥ sarvakartṛtvāt kālasyāpi pradhānameva kāraṇaṃ svabhāvo 'pyatraiva līnaḥ tasmāt kālo na kāraṇam /
GSP31iskgaudu:815: tasmāt prakṛtireva kāraṇaṃ na prakṛteḥ kāraṇāntaramastīti /
GSP31iskgaudu:817: ataḥ prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ subhogyataraṃ na kiñcidīśvarādikāraṇamastīti me matirbhavati
GSP31iskgaudu:820: tasmānna badhyate nāpi mucyate nāpi saṃsarati kaścit /
GSP31iskgaudu:821: saṃsarati badhyate mucyate ca nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ // ISk_62 //
GSP31iskgaudu:822: tasmāt kāraṇāt puruṣo na badhyate nāpi mucyate nāpi saṃsarati yasmāt kāraṇāt prakṛtireva nānāśrayā daivamānuṣatiryagyonyāśrayā buddhyahaṃkāratanmātrendriyabhūtasvarūpeṇa badhyate mucyate saṃsarati ceti /
GSP31iskgaudu:823: atha mukta eva svabhāvāt sa sarvagataśca kathaṃ saṃsaratyaprāptaprāpaṇārthaṃ saṃsaraṇamiti tena puruṣo badhyate puruṣo mucyate saṃsarati vyapadiśyate yena saṃsāritvaṃ na vidyate sattvapuruṣāntajñānāt tattvaṃ puruṣasyābhivyajyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:824: tadabhivyakto kevalaḥ śuddho muktaḥ svarūpapratiṣṭhaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:825: atra yadi puruṣasya bandho nasti tato mokṣo 'pi nāsti /
GSP31iskgaudu:826: atrocyate prakṛtirevātmānaṃ badhnāti mocayati ca yatra sūkṣmaśarīraṃ tanmātrakaṃ trividhakaraṇopetaṃ tat trividhena bandhena badhyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:827: uktaṃ ca prākṛtena ca bandhena tathā vaikārikeṇa ca /
GSP31iskgaudu:830: prakṛtiśca badhyate prakṛtiśca mucyate saṃsaratīti kathaṃ taducyate /
GSP31iskgaudu:832: saiva ca puruṣasyārthaṃ prati vimocayatyekarūpeṇa // ISk_63 //
GSP31iskgaudu:833: rūpaiḥ saptabhirevaitāni sapta procyante dharmo vairāgyamaiśvaryamadharmo
GSP31iskgaudu:834: 'jñānamavairāgyamanaiśvaryyametāni prakṛteḥ saptarūpāṇi tairātmānaṃ svaṃ badhnāti prakṛtirātmānaṃ svameva saiva prakṛtiḥ puruṣasyārthaḥ puruṣārthaḥ karttavya iti vimocayatyātmānamekarūpeṇa jñānena // 63 //
GSP31iskgaudu:838: evamuktena kramena pañcaviṃśatitattvālocanābhyāsādiyaṃ prakṛtirayaṃ puruṣa etāni pañcatanmātrendriyamahābhūtānīti puruṣasya jñānamutpadyate nāsti nāhameva bhavāmi na me mama śarīraṃ tadyato 'hamanyaḥ
GSP31iskgaudu:839: śarīramanyannāhamityapariśeṣamahaṃkārarahitamapariśeṣamaviparyayādviśuddhaṃ viparyayaḥ saṃśayo 'viparyayādasaṃśayādviśuddhaṃ kevalaṃ tadeva nānyadastīti mokṣakāraṇamutpadyate 'bhivyajyate jñānaṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānaṃ puruṣasyeti // 64 //
GSP31iskgaudu:842: prakṛtiṃ paśyati puruṣaḥ prekṣakavadavasthitaḥ svasthaḥ // ISk_65 //
GSP31iskgaudu:843: tena viśuddhena kevalajñānena puruṣaḥ prakṛtiṃ paśyati prekṣakavat prekṣakeṇa tulyamavasthitaḥ svastho yathā raṃgaprekṣako 'vasthito
GSP31iskgaudu:844: narttakīṃ paśyatiḥ svasthaḥ svasmiṃstiṣṭhati svasthaḥ svasthānasthitaḥ /
GSP31iskgaudu:845: kathaṃbhūtāṃ prakṛtiṃ nivṛttaprasavāṃ nivṛttaḥ buddhyahaṃkārakāryyānarthavaśāt saptarūpavinivṛttāṃ nivarttitobhayapuruṣaprayojanavaśādyaiḥ saptabhī rūpairdharmādibhirātmānaṃ badhnāti tebhyaḥ saptabhyo rūpebhyo vinivṛttiṃ prakṛtiṃ paśyati // 65 //
GSP31iskgaudu:848: sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prayojanaṃ nāsti sargasya // ISk_66 //
GSP31iskgaudu:849: raṃgastha iti yathā raṃgastha ityevamupekṣaka ekaḥ kevalaḥ śuddhaḥ puruṣastenāhaṃ dṛṣṭeti kṛtvā uparatā nivṛtā ekā ekaiva prakṛtiḥ trailokyasyāpi pradhānakāraṇabhūtā na dvitīyā prakṛtirasti mūrttibhede
GSP31iskgaudu:850: jātibhedādevaṃ prakṛtipuruṣayornirvṛttāvapi vyāpakatvāt saṃyogo 'sti na tu saṃyogāt kutaḥ sargo bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:851: sati saṃyoge 'pi tayoḥ prakṛtipuruṣayoḥ sarvagatatvāt satyapi saṃyoge prayojanaṃ nāsti
GSP31iskgaudu:853: ubhayatrāpi caritārthatvāt sargasya nāsti prayojanaṃ yaḥ punaḥ sarga iti /
GSP31iskgaudu:854: yathā dānagrahaṇanimitta uttamarṇādhamarṇayordravyaviśuddhau satyapi saṃyoge na kaścidarthasambandho bhavati /
GSP31iskgaudu:856: yadi puruṣasyotpanne jñāne mokṣo bhāti tato mama kasmānna bhavatīti /
GSP31iskgaudu:860: yadyapi pañcaviṃśatitattvajñānaṃ samyak jñānaṃ bhavati tathāpi saṃskāravaśāddhṛtaśarīro yogī tiṣṭhati kathaṃ cakrabhramavaccakrabhrameṇa tulyaṃ yathā kulālaścakraṃ bhramayitvā ghaṭaṃ karoti mṛtpiṇḍaṃ cakramāropya punaḥ kṛtvā ghaṭaṃ paryāmuñcati cakraṃ bhramatyeva saṃskāravaśādevaṃ samyagjñānādhigamādutpannasamyagjñānasya dharmādīnāmakāraṇaprāptau etāni sapta rūpāṇi bandhanabhūtāni samyagjñānena
GSP31iskgaudu:861: dagdhāni yathā nāgninā dagdhāni bījāni prarohaṇasamarthānyevametāni dharmādīni bandhanāni na samarthāni /
GSP31iskgaudu:862: dharmādīnāmakāraṇaprāptau saṃskāravaśāddhṛtaśarīrāstiṣṭhati jñānādvarttamānadharmādharmakṣayaḥ kasmānna bhavati varttamānatvādeva kṣaṇāntare kṣayamapyeti jñānaṃ tvanāgatakarma dahati varttamānaśarīreṇa ca yat karoti tadapīti vihitānuṣṭhānakaraṇāditi saṃskārakṣayāccharīrapāte mokṣaḥ // 67 //
GSP31iskgaudu:866: dharmādharmajanitasaṃskārakṣayāt prāpte śarīrabhede caritārthatvāt pradhānasya nivṛttau aikāntikamavaśyamātyantikamanantarhitaṃ kaivalyaṃ kevalabhāvānmokṣa ubhayamaikāntikātyantikamityeva viśiṣṭakaivalyamāpnoti
GSP31iskgaudu:869: puruṣārtho mokṣastadarthaṃ jñānamidaṃ guhyaṃ rahasyaṃ paramarṣiṇā śrīkapilarṣiṇā samākhyātaṃ samyaguktaṃ yatra jñāne bhūtānāṃ vaikārikāṇāṃ sthityutpattipralayā avasthānāvirbhāvatirobhāvāścintyante vicāryante yeṣāṃ vicārāt samyak pañcaviṃśatitattvavivecanātmikā sampadyate saṃvittiriti //
GSP31iskgaudu:874: āsurirapi pañcaśikhāya tena ca bahulīkṛtaṃ tantram // ISk_70 //
